entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
